Importing VitalDBR
```{r}
library(devtools)
#install_github('legendenomgeorg/VitalDBR/VitalDBR')
library(VitalDBR)
#remotes::install_github("https://github.com/JohannesNE/waveformtools")
library(waveformtools)
#install.packages("GENEAread")
library(GENEAread)
```

Loading in data
```{r}
df <- load_case('Primus/AWP', 1)

```

```{r}
plot(df)
```
```{r}
sub<- window(df,1000,1010) #  10 sekunder fra 10000 (cirka 625 observationer)
plot(sub, type='l')
```


```{r}
peaks <-find_peaks(sub, m=5)

plot(sub,line='l')
points(window(sub, value=peaks))


```
